subject: Running
Pole Vault
lead_paragraph: Bernard Lagat ratcheted up the pace two laps from the finish, spurred on by the crowd of 12,647 at Madison Square Garden, to win the meet’s marquee event in 3 minutes 57.51 seconds.
snippet: Bernard Lagat ratcheted up the pace two laps from the finish, spurred on by the crowd of 12,647 at Madison Square Garden, to win the meet’s marquee event in 3 minutes 57.51 seconds.
